issue.title: [Rust] BinaryArray::value_offset incorrect in offset case
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3797](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3797). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The method BinaryArray::value_offset does not take into account the offset in the underlying ArrayData; hence it gives incorrect results when the ArrayData offset is not zero.
